div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Discard 2 cards from top of your deck (self-harm). Your next attack this turn: +3 damage, ignores 1 Defense, and -1 to target number (easier to hit).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: When an ally within 2 hexes would take damage, redirect that damage to yourself instead. Gain 1 Heat.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Each time an allied Casket is destroyed this mission, gain +1 damage to all attacks permanently for the rest of the mission (stacks).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Create a 3-hex radius healing zone centered on you until end of round. Allied Caskets in this zone recover 2 cards from discard pile at start of their turn.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: When an allied Casket within 3 hexes is destroyed (deck reaches 0), immediately recover 5 cards from your discard pile and draw 2 cards.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 5 damage. This attack cannot miss. If target has killed an ally this mission, deal 7 damage instead.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 8 damage, ignore 1 Defense. On Miss: Recover 2 SP and gain 'Judgment Delayed' (+3 damage to next attack).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Gain 5 SP immediately. Can only be used once per mission. Gain 2 Heat.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Remove 3 Heat. Recover 3 cards from discard pile to deck (shuffle). Absolve your sins.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 4 damage. Target cannot move until end of their next turn. Discard 1 card from your deck (self-harm).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
